articles.description: Nick Kyrgios has made a mockery of the rankings with a straight-sets win over the world No 8 in a heated grudge match
articles.content: Nick Kyrgios has made a mockery of the rankings with a win over world No 8 Casper Ruud in a grudge match at Indian Wells. Kyrgios made it clear the bad blood between the pair remains after swatting t… [+1852 chars]

articles.title: Daniil Medvedev sends defiant message to Novak Djokovic as he prepares to steal No 1 back - Express
articles.description: NOVAK DJOKOVIC will return to the top spot of the rankings after Daniil Medvedev's Indian Wells loss to Gael Monfils.
articles.content:
But in he unlikely event he never returns to the top spot, Medvedev admitted he was just happy to have been there.
